label: 鎌倉幕府
本: The Distinctive Characteristics of the Environs of Kamakura as a Medieval City. ACTA ASIATICA, 81 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2001-09
説明文: the military or warrior government which was established m the late twelfth century with its base in eastern Japan, and throughout the medieval period It remained the largest city in eastern Japan.
